name: RAVERWAVE
description:
RAVERWAVE is a free/non-commercial browser based rhythm/dance game made as a passion project and inspired by StepMania, Dance Dance Revolution, Pump It Up, etc.

As a kid I was obsessed with DDR, and because I can't play StepMania on my Mac anymore, I made a playable desktop+mobile web version that doesn't need any installation or setup!

This game on Itch is just direct linked to the site since it's an online game (and the songs will probably change semi frequently), hopefully that's acceptable!
